description: We're back this week with a solo look at one of our newest recruits, Gio, for our War Chest Update. Yes, the same Gio that's in our latest release, Rear Admiral 3.Gio came on board here at Active Duty eager and ready to please. He's not shy in the least and he came straight out of doing a solo and right into doing Rear Admiral 3 without missing a beat. This young trooper is hot as all hell and when he latches on to a cock he gives it his all and he shoots a huge load while he's being plowed. There wasn't a lot of 'basic training' necessary to get this recruit ready for duty and I'm sure you're gonna grow to love him as he'll be a regular here at Active Duty from now on.
title: Giovanni, Scene #01
